name: Milky Way (clerkliercorgi)
description:
Milky Way for WGJ #135
theme: shooting stars

You play as a rogue shooting star that has finally found an unlimited source of energy far more powerful than any sun—chocolate chip cookies! The poor misguided cookies are on a pilgrimage to dunk themselves in the Milk-y way in their search for eternal salvation. Don't let them die in vain! Consume them and give meaning to their lives!

-------------------------------

This is my first entry to a game jam ever and my first game on Godot. This was an exercise in familiarizing myself with a typical godot project structure, physics bodies, game states, etc.

Thanks to the amazingly clear tutorial videos by Angega Studios on Youtube!

Appreciate any and all feedback!
